summary: "A Discovery of Witches" is a British fantasy TV show based on Deborah Harkness's books. It follows a witch and a vampire, played by Teresa Palmer and Matthew Goode, who team up to protect magical creatures. The series, produced by Bad Wolf and Sky Studios, premiered in 2018 on Sky One and ran for three seasons. It received positive reviews, especially for the main characters' chemistry, and was nominated for Best New Drama at the National Television Awards.
title: A Discovery of Witches (TV series)
